rules_text:
Ward–{C}{C}, Sacrifice a creature.
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses X life and you amass Homunculi X, where X is the number of creatures that died this turn. [i](Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Homunculus. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Homunculus Army creature token first.)[/i]
